about_the_game:
Chaos Games N-in-1... A fusion game brimming with "chaos" and "glitches"!

(Don't worry, we'll still fix the bugs that affect gameplay.)

A multitude of familiar-looking *characters from various video game genres are all mixed up here!

Experience the familiar yet strange feeling—control the characters you know and love, facing enemies that are not supposed to be here, and survive!

With each level you clear, you get a chance for a significant upgrade! But at the same time, you'll face new levels that become more chaotic and complex due to your choices... Is it a "crisis" or an "opportunity"?

*(All content in this work is purely fictional and has no connection to any actual groups, organizations, works, religions, etc. Any resemblance is purely coincidental.)

Will it be complicated?

Relax, you'll get the hang of it in 10 seconds!

—Most of the time, you'll only use the directional keys (or joystick) and one function key!

It’s really simple, but you won't feel bored, because...

Features

  • Varied gameplay—Each of the numerous playable characters has its own unique design. Along with a plethora of upgrade options and chaotic effects randomly combined, every playthrough offers new fun!

  • Fast-paced casual play—Each normal game session ends within 20 minutes!

  • Strategic depth—Find a balance between chaotic "upgrades" and "glitches" to discover the path that maximizes your enjoyment!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: A fusion game brimming with "chaos" and "glitches"! Command familiar characters, confront unexpected foes, and endure! Each level cleared offers a major upgrade, yet ushers in increasingly chaotic and complex stages due to your decisions. Is it a crisis or an opportunity?
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
